name: THEA 117
title: Design Studio: Costume
description: Students learn advanced principles and theory of costume design, and apply these toward a large project for theatrical/film production or for character design for animation and gaming. May be repeated for credit.
class_notes: This course is an introductory Costume Design course; it is intended to give an understanding of the principles and elements of the Costume Design process. From the research and interdisciplinary collaboration to the role of the costume designer during construction and beyond. This class will walk you through critical thinking exercises, hands-on activities, and lectures that will review the role of a Costume Designer in a performance.
